row_list: Dataset with translations for the TOMLA mobile app.
Translations of all display texts and 2 built-in manuals (Quick Start Guide + User Manual).
The app uses 241 text variables that have translations in 4 base languages: EN, F, D and NL.
English is used as the default language when a variable or translation for a variable is missing.
This spreadsheet is converted with the tfg.py conversion script. See the TOMLA Manual.
